author: USA TODAY, Hannah Yasharoff, USA TODAY
title: Chris Cuomo makes surprise appearance during brother Gov. Andrew Cuomo's coronavirus briefing
description: Chris Cuomo made a guest appearance during his brother New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo's daily coronavirus briefing for an update on his diagnosis.
content:
Addressing his brother, CNN's Chris Cuomo, New York Governor Andrew Cuomo emphasizes that no one can be completely protected against COVID-19.
USA TODAY
